rows.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
WHEN THE HELP of God arrives and victory,

rows.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
rows.translation: And you see men enter God's discipline horde on horde,
rows.transliteration: wara-aytan nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīnillāhi afwājā

rows.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
rows.translation: Then glorify your Lord and seek His forgiveness. Verily He is relenting.
rows.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastaghfirh ۚ innahu kāna tawwābā
